string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: All Custom FirePower Look made by @myellow
Re-DID all the mods from the ground UP
You can now swipe left to block notifications (CSC Feature)
Removed Stock Kernels out of Aroma
You can now View Changelog in DualSettings 》About Device 》Changelog
Special thanks to @gayos24 who made FirePower Settings V2
Immersive Mode Chooser in FirePower Settings
FirePower Settings APP New Theme and Icon by @myellow Added
Added Adaway,Xposed,Viper,Dolby in Settings Choose in Aroma Stock or Xposed. Viper Settings
Updated Aroma Updater-script with Custom Look
Added Exyfire Boot Splash choose in Aroma Stock or Exyfire Boot Splash
Added ExyFire Boot Animation Choose in Aroma Stock or ExyFire Boot Animation
Removed RoundedUI out of Aroma now you got 3 choices RoundedUI+MODS gets the most MODS
Added Settings without Xposed Viper or Xposed Viper in Settings as an Option in Aroma
Rebased to APFG - JULY Security Patch
And Many More Check in Settings>AboutDevice>Changelog For Full Changelog
